text: Making the Cake Whisk together the soymilk and vinegar. Set aside to curdle. Whisk together the flours, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. Mix the margarine and both sugars until the ingredients are creamy and fully combined. Add the vegan "sour cream" and mix again. Whisk vanilla into the curdled soymilk.  Mix the wet ingredients and dry ingredients together, alternating between them. Beat the mixture just enough to fully combine. Spoon 3 to 4 tablespoons of dough at a time onto the baking sheets. Bake for 10 to 14 minutes, until they crackle slightly on top. Making the Filling Beat together the confectioner's sugar and shortening.  Add the soymilk and vanilla.  Whip for a good 2 to 3 minutes until the mixture is lighter and fluffier.  Put the filling between the flat sides of two cakes and serve!  Finished.
